attributes.action: Ban or restrict the sale of Lasers and laser pens / pointers which are being pointed at planes and could bring one down
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Kids and youth can easily buy a Laser pointer and shine the laser as a helicoptor or plane landing dazzleing the pilot this could cause a crash it the pilot of a airliner is blinded by a laser this could bring it down killing all the passengers people should not be able to just buy these the sale should be restricted
